title: Inquiry-Based Discussion Learning (DBOIL) Program to Enhance Scientific Argumentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and practical experience in professional fields (social sector)
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical fields) accustomed to BYOD environments and required to demonstrate scientific reasoning skills for solving complex social issues

learning_goals: Learners can construct clear arguments based on scientific evidence to solve given social problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can construct valid counterarguments and provide evidence-based evaluations of peers' claims at least three times.
Learners can identify logical fallacies in argumentation processes and propose corrective measures with over 90% participation.

resources: Five types of mock argumentation scenarios

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
